overview: Former porn film actor Willie Gordon couldn't be happier with his new life.  He's now married, and has his own photography studio.  Things are going well for him.  That is, until he is blackmailed by a producer and one of his neighbors into making one more film.  Complicating matters is that Willie's wife Anne has no idea of his past life in adult movies.
tagline: He tried to quit but they would not let him go!
title: Exposed
